summary: The Smiths were an English rock band formed in 1982, known for their unique sound blending 1960s rock and post-punk. The band consisted of Morrissey (vocals), Johnny Marr (guitar), Andy Rourke (bass), and Mike Joyce (drums). They gained popularity in the 1980s with albums like "The Smiths" and "Meat Is Murder," reaching the top of UK charts. Despite adding keyboards and a second guitarist, internal conflicts led to their breakup in 1987. The band members have refused reunion offers, and Rourke passed away in 2023.
title: The Smiths
